snippet: President Obama's surprise trip to Afghanistan comes even as his re-election campaign has set off a heated debate about the propriety of using Osama bin Laden's killing to make a political argument in the battle for the White House with Mitt Romney.
abstract: President Obama's surprise trip to Afghanistan comes even as his re-election campaign has set off a heated debate about the propriety of using Osama bin Laden's killing to make a political argument in the battle for the White House with Mitt Romney.

headline.main: Obama's Afghanistan Trip Could Escalate Political Criticism
